name: Crazy Machines 2: Invaders From Space, 2nd Wave
name_original: Crazy Machines 2: Invaders From Space, 2nd Wave
description:
Crazy Machines 2: Invaders From Space, 2nd Wave is a puzzle game developed by Fakt Software. It came out on 01-08-2013. Viva Meda published the game.
Crazy Machines 2: Invaders From Space, 2nd Wave is available on PC.
